member.name: M:HealthGateway.Medication.Controllers.MedicationRequestController.GetMedicationRequests(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a json of medication request.
member.response: the client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.
The client does not have access rights to the content; that is, it is unauthorized, so the server is refusing to give the requested resource. Unlike 401, the client's identity is known to the server.
